description:
'''Chromeo''' is a Canadian [[electro-funk]] duo from [[Montreal]], formed in 2002 by musicians David "Dave 1" Macklovitch and Patrick "P-Thugg" Gemayel. Their sound draws from [[soul music]], [[dance music]], [[Rock music|rock]], [[synth-pop]], [[disco]] and [[funk]].

As of 2024, the band has released six studio albums, with three of them hitting the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] charts. In 2018, Chromeo received their first [[Grammy Award]] nomination for [[Grammy Award for Best Engineered Album, Non-Classical|Best Engineered Album, Non-Classical]] for their album ''[[Head over Heels (Chromeo album)|Head over Heels]]''.
